website_summaries.verdict: A simple, inexpensive waterproof camera to keep poolside, the Fujifilm FinePix Z33WP is nonetheless lacking in photo quality and performance.

customer_reviews.title: Takes great underwater photographs, especially macro
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife who is a very experienced photographer. The original plan was to buy a more expensive model. But we ended up getting this one instead. We are not disappointed at all. I'm on a three year stay in Hawaii for the Army and on our off days we like to go snorkeling. So far it has performed admirably. Underwater shots taken in low light conditions are of mediocre quality but ones taken in full sunlight are superb. Macro shots are my wife's favorite and on a recent trip to Shark's Cove she was amazed by the quality this camera returned. The video is of that trip.
customer_reviews.author: T.A.L.

customer_reviews.title: Not so great...
customer_reviews.text: I love this little cameras package. The color, the functionality, it's waterproof (which was the main reason I wanted it) and it's just too darn cute. However, all that aside, the picture quality is horrible. I was so disappointed. I actually returned it because of this fact. For 10mp it should have had great picture quality. My Nikon Coolpix 5mp has way better picture quality so I'll stick with it now. For the Fuji Z33WP though, I could not believe how grainy the pictures were. I even used multiple settings and megapixels to see if I could be satisfied but it didn't work. Keep this in mind if you plan on purchasing this camera.
customer_reviews.author: MrDrew

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Camera for the Water
customer_reviews.text: The video says it all. Sorry about the thumb. The video came out 100% perfect but did not transfer over well to Amazon. I took this camera to Six flags and went into the water and down the slides with the camera all day long. Worked Great! Went to the beach and also performed 100%. Camera is small enough to fit into a pocket and comes with a wrist strap that I used in the water. Very easy to set up and install battery and card. easy transfer to computer to download photos. The camera does come with a quick set up guide which is really all that is needed. Purchased from Adorama. Quick shipping! Have Fun in the Sun!!!
customer_reviews.author: Scuba

customer_reviews.title: LOVED THIS CAMERA!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVED THIS CAMERA! Best camera ever made? No. Especially on land. However, I think that's to be expected given that it's made primarily for use in the water. And take PHENOMENAL underwater shots and video it did!!! For the price it was a steal. Too bad I dropped mine in the ocean in Mexico last December because from what I understand, they made some changes to the most recent model that have made it not that great. Prior to Mexico this camera has been snorkeling in Hawaii several times, floating on the river, out on the boat...and survived it all. I am generally not gentle with these things either. WISH THEY WOULD BRING IT BACK!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: kestrelk8

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I purchased this camera for our trip to Hawaii. I purposely waited to write this review until we returned so that I had a thorough review to give. The camera lived up to every expectation! It was great for all of the snorkeling we did and not only took great underwater pictures, but the recording feature works awesome too! This is hands down, one of the best and most affordable investments we made this summer! Our only wish is that the camera's zoom feature was better, but its not something we can't live with. If you're looking for something affordable and compact for underwater use, this is a great choice. :)
customer_reviews.author: The D's

customer_reviews.title: Best investment for our vacations!
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. I have several digital cameras, including a SLR camera, and this one I really appreciate it a lot! The picture quality is pretty good, I just use it when we are at the beach or pool. I use it with a long strap that can be worn around the neck, it doesn't bother me to swim or float. It has a pretty good image zoom, enough for playing around with kids. Easy to use under water and it takes the pictures very fast, much better than my non-waterproof cannon or sony. This is an excellent choice to be used as a secondary camera just for water fun.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie2709

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for the specific purpose of taking it on vacation with my family this summer. I have used it at Sea World, water parks, in pools, and in the rain at DisneyWorld...it works great outdoors. Indoors, however, it does not have the best picture quality. I use my DSLR for those pics, instead. When I was shopping around for a waterproof camera, I was deciding between this one and a similarly priced Olympus one. I chose this one because it was cheaper and seemed to have better customer reviews. I have not been disappointed. It has served the purpose for which I bought it...to take vacation photos at locations with water.
customer_reviews.author: GA Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for a vacation to Honduras. We planed a lot of water sports and trips in the rain forest. Well it rained a lot. The camera was great. When the sun came out we were in the water. The camera was great. I took over 300 pics. They look very nice. I was going to spend more money on a camera but thought it would get wrecked on this vacation. This little camera was the hit of our trip. Everyone loved it. I just wish the zoom was stronger than 3x but for the money I'm very happy. can't wait to snorkel again and take more pics.
customer_reviews.author: John Alberti

customer_reviews.title: TAPE THE DOORS SHUT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT "wait and see." Do NOT "Try it out first." Do NOT think "This guy is incompetent, it won't happen to me." Do NOT take this camera under water until you have used electrical tape to securely lock the door to the battery/memory card. I bought this before going on the vacation of a lifetime and it lasted TWO trips into the water before the "lock" opened when either my finger moved it while swimming or it just unlocked with the waves. Either way, I never saw a picture from it except through the view screen. It is an excellent idea IF you actually waterproof it yourself.
customer_reviews.author: A. Murray

customer_reviews.title: ... for a trip to Mexico and I was not disappointed. I used it in the water a lot ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera for a trip to Mexico and I was not disappointed. I used it in the water a lot and it had no issues whatsoever. The pictures were clear and looked great. I definitely recommend to anyone looking for a underwater/waterproof camera as it was really rather nice and easy to use, just make sure you buy a float to put on it, so that you don't lose it in the water.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Z.

customer_reviews.title: poor image quality
customer_reviews.text: I putchased this camera because I wanted a good pocket camera for vacations, and I figured the waterproof thing would be a nice advantage. The form factor of the camera is good. It seems well designed, is stylish, and is extremely small. However, the picture quality is extremely poor. I tried several shots, both indoors and out, and I was amazed at how poor the picture quality was. The indoor shots were just unusable. The outdoor shots, while better, were still not great. If image quality matters to you at all, I recommend you buy a different camera. I returned mine and got a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Nonononono

customer_reviews.title: Did the job
customer_reviews.text: Word of advice: don't use the flash underwater if there is a lot of plankton or other floating things in the water. It ended up ruining a number of my pics. Camera is good if the light is strong, and the video works ok, although I did have to color-correct the video afterwards. Still, I was able to film whale sharks up close while swimming alongside them, and if you stay very shallow in clear water (less than 10 feet), you'll get satisfactory results. About all you can expect from a camera in this price range.
customer_reviews.author: JK in NY

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. I got it 4 years ago and it works just as great as it did when I got it. I took it with me on a trip to the Bahama's and my niece constantly plays with it in our pool. The only down side is that it doesn't work as well indoors, but I don't use it inside since it's an underwater camera. I love this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Still works six years later
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for underwater photos only, it works great. Good for daytime light at beach but not for indoor or night. I always rinsed it off and made sure it was dry after using underwater. Got great shots snorkeling and swimming with friends on vacations each year. I definitely recommend it. Buy the accessory kit too!
customer_reviews.author: Raven the MavenTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Great Waterproof Camera for the Money
customer_reviews.text: I Bought this camera for a 8 day backpacking trip to the High Sierras East of Fresno, CA. The Camera worked great in both dry and wet, in fact it shot good pictures and Video during several thunder storms. I had not intended to test the camera's waterproofness in this way but I had the camera in my pocket when I had to swim about 200 yrds in a extremely cold mountain lake. The camera worked great only had to clean the lense off since even little water droplets show up on the pictures or video...
customer_reviews.author: Richard L. Sauter

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Takes amazing pictures. We have used in pools, ocean and hot tubs holds up great and pictures great. We always rinse the camera off after use. Color makes it easy to find if we should drop. Happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Donna F

customer_reviews.title: water proof camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera to go on a trip to a caribbean island , last year I bought disposable waterproof cameras and some of the pictures didn't come out, I rate this on regular use so far , we don't leave for our vacation til May , But I am sure it won't disappoint .The pictures I have taken and video are very clear and it is fairly easy to use, had to get used to a new camera and what it does .I will be using it on my trip to snorkel so i am sure that since I won't be more that a couple feet under water it will do just fine for what I want it for.
customer_reviews.author: Ann M. Stinsman

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CAMERA FOR THE PRICE!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera as a secondary camera for a trip to Barbados because I wanted something waterproof but did not want to spend a lot of money. This camera was very impressive. I am usually a DSLR person but this camera is so portable and durable it is hard to argue against it. It now goes everywhere with me just in case. I have not taken it diving but have taken it in rain storms and out in the ocean with me swimming and it works great. If you are looking for a low priced water proof camera this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason A. Burgess

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Takes great outdoor & underwater pictures. What I did not trully appreciate was the ability to take water videos. From my kids in our pool to the log ride at six flags in Dallas. That is a wonderful bonus that I did not expect. Indoor pictures not good. Ok, but not good. For outside it is totally wonderful. Would recommend to all, as an outdoor fun in the sun camera. FYI: when ordering this camera make sure you order an extra battery. It might be our useage is more draining due to our video shots as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: for wakeboarding
customer_reviews.text: This camera takes great pictures and I have taken it on rafting trips and snowskiing as well. Only bad thing is that in the continous shot mode it is really really slow. I bought this camera so I could use it for action wakeboard shots from the inner tube behind the boat while people jump over. But it is so hard to time a single shot it gets frustrating. I think I am going to get the olympus waterproof as their continous shot is really fast. But all in all if you just want this camera to be waterproof for simple shots around water or snow its perfect.
customer_reviews.author: EK

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I wanted. A relatively inexpensive little underwater camera that takes very decent photos, is easy to use, easy to carry, and even does great video. I was headed to Tahiti and Bora Bora, and HAD to have something like that for the trip. It easily paid for itself in the savings from my old 35mm underwater camera's costs for film and development, as well as allowed me to go crazy and snap away like mad. I got some great underwater photos of sharks, rays, and the coral reefs.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Garner

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera to take with us to Disneyworld. I used it the whole time for regular pictures and water pics. Its rounded edges slid in and out of my pocket easily. The picture quality is awesome and since the zoom lens in behind a shield I could wipe it with a wet one and not worry about scratching the lens or no fingerprints. I love that I can still do vidoes too AND play them back and hear them! I took video of me and my son going down a waterslide and its a great memory I will always cherish. VERY please with this camera and I have recommended it to ALL of my friends!
customer_reviews.author: KristyLMan

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is waterproof. I put it in a bucket of water and left it for hours. No leaking. Love the bright green color, and it will be great for getting all of my water fun on my upcoming cruise! Now I just have to learn how to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Musiyenko

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera - good photo quality.
customer_reviews.text: Read complaints about the picture quality - good enough for me. Had for 5 years now with no problem. I take kayaking, hiking, biking. Gets damp, dirty, abused and still works great. For fun I took a pic underwater once. I take snapshots. Maybe you get better photos with a 35MM, but get a waterproof and small one of those.
customer_reviews.author: D. Bohlen

customer_reviews.title: Good WP Digital for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased camera for cruise to Mexico to use for snorkeling. Ended up using it for kayaking and some shots where I just didn't want to take my Nikon DSLR. Worked great for snorkeling once I got the hang of it. It is a little hard to use in bright sunlight as the screen fades out quickly. Took several snaps and several videos while snorkeling and they mostly turned out great (ones that didn't were usually operator error). Overall, a very good camera for the money if you are concerned about getting your regular camera wet.
customer_reviews.author: Old Man tn

customer_reviews.title: leaked water first time we went snorkeling.  Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: We bought this camera and all the additional acessories for a trip to Hawaii and it leaked water the first time we took it with us snorkeling. Because we bought extra batteries we decided to purchase the same camera at a local store. Even though the second camera worked okay, the trip was half way over and we missed so much. If I had to do it over again, I would have paid more and had the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: R. T

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a value priced waterproof camera to use while vacationing in Hawaii. We are so pleased with this camera. We used the camera for hours at a time, snapping many pictures. Our images were good quality and had no problems with battery life or water leaking. We were careful to rinse the camera after each use in the ocean (salt water) as the manual directs. I would recommend this camera for casual, recreational use.
customer_reviews.author: Wheels

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is perfect for my purpose. I didn't really want to take underwater photos, I just wanted to be able to be swimming in the water and be able to take photos of people in the water. The quality of the photos are great! This camera is lightweight and easy to use. (I made my own wrist strap out of cut noodles to keep it from sinking). I definitely recommend this WP camera!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy D

customer_reviews.title: Good little camera
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something I could easily carry on hikes, bike rides or just easily anywhere. It had to be water proof in case I got rained on or sweated heavily. So far this has met my needs. Pictures come out pretty nice, and it is easy to use. The only complaint is that it did not come with a memory card, I had to get that elsewhere. But it was easy enough to do.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Haberman

customer_reviews.title: Fuji in pink
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my granddaughter for Christmas...she likes pink. And the camera performs pretty well. She likes swimming a lot, so having a waterproof camera seemed to be the right solution. I put a 4 Gig SD card in it, and it will take hundreds of pictures before running out of space. It fits her hand, and with a floating strap she can use it in the pool without a worry.
customer_reviews.author: Philip W. Knopp

customer_reviews.title: Not so great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera to take fishing but after taking hundreds of pictures with it trying to get a decent shot I gave up and sent it back. The pictures were just too grainy. I compared photos taken with this camera and my 8 year old 4MP Cannon Powershot G4 and the old 4MP camera took better pictures every time. I guess these little point and shoots just aren't for me.
customer_reviews.author: J. Young

customer_reviews.title: Takes great night shots
customer_reviews.text: I actually didn't buy the for its underwater picture but for its night shots. Take the best night pictures over any other camera I've ever had hands down.
customer_reviews.author: carissa

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: Took this camera on my trip to Cozumel. I saw a few other people with the same camera taking pictures underwater. Pros: Absolutely AMAZING underwater photos Totally waterproof...even to 10 feet under water Pictures on land are good too, but you have to be in the right picture mode Cons: Not much really Grainy night shots (but what camera does take decent night shots???)
customer_reviews.author: Mlrtime

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is just what I wanted, durable and waterproof. I take my camera on the boat all summer and my last one got ruined from the moisture just being in my beach bag. I've used this one for a couple years now and have had no problems. Wish it took a little better pictures, but for the price it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Diane L. Gore

customer_reviews.title: Pics seemed a bit muted in color and saturation. ...
customer_reviews.text: Pics seemed a bit muted in color and saturation. Otherwise, it made my trip to the Galapagos extremely memorable (or, said differently, I have to remember less). And it survived it's distracted owner getting smashed into some very sharp coral and being used as a paddle.
customer_reviews.author: Charles D. Freeman

customer_reviews.title: MY DAUGHTER LOVES THIS CAMERA!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this camera back in December for Christmas for my teen daughter. Went to Cancun right after Christmas and she loved taking photos in the pool and at the beach. Also nice for boating trips and swim parties! She loves the "easy video" button and the fact that she can charge her battery and not worry about AA's. We also had fun taking photos in the rain in Paris. Overall a great camera. And it was less expensive on Amazon than in Target - BTW, Target does not sell this camera in Pink.
customer_reviews.author: D. Stoner

customer_reviews.title: great camera
customer_reviews.text: this is a strong camera.. i dropped it within the first 24 hours i had it. still worked.. took it on vacation to florida with me .. i had the camera in the pool and the ocean with no problems at all. the quality of some of the pictures differ from one setting to another. the camera for the price is way worth it.. if you take a lot of pictures you are bound to get a bunch that are fantastic..
customer_reviews.author: hazzmatt

customer_reviews.title: Case leaked first time used underwater...
customer_reviews.text: ...and beware of return policies. We bought thru an Amazon supplier, Adorama. Their return policy completely excludes underwater cameras. They directed us to contact Fujifilm directly. Have so far been trying for a week: phone system goes into an endless voicemail loop with apparently non-existent operator; no response thus far to email. Will update if/when ever get response, but so far very unhappy with service.
customer_reviews.author: A Family Doc

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera, but Handle Carefully!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVED this camera SO much! Unfortunately I'm a bit clumsy and dropped it on pavement. Not noticing a small chip in the plastic, I took it diving and water leaked in. Bye bye camera. :-( You'll love this camera, just be careful not to drop it!
customer_reviews.author: Mintyfresh319

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof at all!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for my vacation to Mexico. At first it worked perfectly and the pictures turned out well. This camera was only submerged in the water once for about 2 mins on day 4 of our trip. I followed all instructions on cleaning it after being in salt water, but it failed to turn back on later that same day. I took the batteries out and replaced them with fresh batteries, still no luck. The pictures I took with the camera were still fine in the sim card, and nothing appeared wet or damaged, just no power. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin McCrone

customer_reviews.title: great camera for the field
customer_reviews.text: I am a 2nd Lt. in the Marine Corps and I needed a camera to take to the field. I needed something that was durable, waterproof, and small. This camera was a perfect choice! The only qualm I have is with the battery life. However, the picture quality makes up for this. All in all, this is a great camera.
customer_reviews.author: SAB

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for our Hawaiian trip thinking I was going to get pretty good pics. I had no idea that they were going to come out great! I read the reviews and the price was right. So I took a chance. Underwater pics and film were clear and bright. Lighting is important with any underwater camera. So make sure its not clouding for the best results. The controls were easy to use and this little camera also took great lively pictures on dry land.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Castro

customer_reviews.title: Fuji Digital Camera water resistant.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for sometime now and I take it for kayaking, hunting, fishing in all weather. Ice fishing too.!!! It works all the time if you remember to charge it!
customer_reviews.author: Grand Rapids Michigan

customer_reviews.title: nice camera
customer_reviews.text: I've taken this camera on a couple of beach trips. Works great and takes pretty good pictures. Haven't had any problems with using in water. Love the size, very compact and easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: GREAT WATERPROOF CAMERA
customer_reviews.text: GREAT GREAT GREAT CAMERA. Waterproof to depths that it advertises. Fast shooting, fast flash recharge, good battery life, and great pics under water. Also the videos under water turned out great. For the price I would recommend this camera to anyone. I have owned 2 sonys, 3 cannons, and 2 fujis, and for the price, this camera really competes.
customer_reviews.author: GLOMASTER

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: Was somewhat skeptical regarding the waterproof-ness of a digital camera, but it worked like wonders! Was able to finally get away from the relatively expensive and not-so-great disposable water cameras that required processing. This helped change the way I travel - it's light weight, easy to use, and takes decent underwater pictures! So far no problems at all. Well worth the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: Victor S

customer_reviews.title: This was a gift from my husband, before Italy Trip
customer_reviews.text: I received this camera as a gift with the kit. Amazon and UPS delivered the camera on time and in one piece. The Fuji Z33WP is compact, lightweight and really cool. The pictures and video and software are great. I love the floating strap and silicon case. And I think the battery charging system is compact and flexible.
customer_reviews.author: David Tennant

customer_reviews.title: great for kayak
customer_reviews.text: I have been a loyal fuji user and I am not disappointed with this waterproof camera. I bought it for kayaking, slim design makes it easy to tuck into a lifejacket pocket. Less worries bringing it along for a day at the beach than a non waterproof model.
customer_reviews.author: redclay

customer_reviews.title: love this camera!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I bought this camera to take on a cruise with excursions involving water. Never had a problem with battery life. Just took the charger on the trip and charged it every night. Used the camera for 1.5 hrs while snorkeling. Pictures are great. Although, they do not appear great on my computer, but once printing on a machine at CVS and using the "Restore Color" option they are unbelievable. Picture quality out of water are just as great. Make sure there is no water on the lens though when out of water of you will have spots on your image.
customer_reviews.author: A. Kidwell

customer_reviews.title: great camera
customer_reviews.text: I have used this many times in and out of water for about 5 yrs now. Still works fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Desire

customer_reviews.title: takes very good underwater shots as well as a great over all
customer_reviews.text: bought this as a gift for my daughter she loves it. takes very good underwater shots as well as a great over all camera
customer_reviews.author: cocopics

customer_reviews.title: Kids' new toy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for one of the kids for Christmas. This has become one of their favorite toys. They love going to the pool and taking pictures of themselves underwater. They can't wait until summer to try it at the lake & the beach. Pictures turn out well. The only drawback so far is the shutter delay. Your subjects can move before the picture is taken.
customer_reviews.author: M. Conner

customer_reviews.title: Good Point and Shoot
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift after using someone else's camera. He demonstrated its waterproofness by dunking it into my water glass in a restaurant. Of course, I didn't know it was waterproof at the time. haha He took it out and continued taking picture the rest of the night. The quality of the pictures were good and the camera is smaller than my cellphone and is very light weight. So, it would be very easy to carry around in your pocket. It is very user friendly and has a lot of picture modes, even one for "ebay" which takes 3 pictures and makes it into one collage.
customer_reviews.author: Wailing E. Quist

customer_reviews.title: I love this camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera! It has traveled the world with me and takes great pictures underwater and out of water.
customer_reviews.author: greenidgemini

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera as a gift for a hard-to-please sixteen-year-old's birthday. She is thrilled with it and has been Scuba diving on her Hawaiian vacation just so she can take underwater photos. I understand the results are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie W

customer_reviews.title: It works well underwater
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old bought this and she loves it. Works great in water conditions and under water. It's a bit slow on the shutter so there are absolute trade-of's from other digital cameras. This is a great UNDERWATER camera but only a so-so DRY camera. But the kids love it at the pool and beach.
customer_reviews.author: Bob the Builder

customer_reviews.title: #1nana
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this camera for our trip to Australia. Husband tried it out in our pool taking pictures of grandson and it worked great! Very happy with purchase and know we will get more great pictures! You won't be sorry if you purchase this camera.
customer_reviews.author: #1nana

customer_reviews.title: Fujifilm FinePix Z33WP 10MP Waterproof Digital Camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera a year ago and I still really like it. During the winter, I dropped it and the inside lens broke, so it's hard to look at my pics because of the cracked screen, but it still takes great pics and videos.
customer_reviews.author: Audra Ritter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera only for under-water use because I thought that considering the price the pictures wouldn't be so great, so I could use my previous camera for other pictures. But I was very surprised to realize that it's amazing, the pictures are great, the resolution is perfect, you can take great pictures even while moving and the colors look amazing (especially when taking close-ups of flowers). I would definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Naty18

customer_reviews.title: good camera
customer_reviews.text: great little camera, is for a young child and it's easy for her to take pictures. spend alot of time at water parks in the summer and the camera's waterproof feature makes taking it along a must.
customer_reviews.author: Kimster

customer_reviews.title: great little camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is easy to use; small and compact. Did not realize that the video had sound. Have not tried it in the water yet. Great little camera for the price. Also bought one for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Boots

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality not as good as I'd hoped for, but I think better than the disposable water cameras.
customer_reviews.author: JaJa

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera for your water adventures
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera for water use on our vacation. The camera is easy to you, handles and shoots well. It went snorkeling, down water slides and in the pool. The photos were a good quality and sound was surprisingly clear on the videos. Even though the intention was to use the camera in the water only, out of the water did well too. Overall a fun camera at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: S. Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I spend my free time kayaking and this camera couldn't be better for the job. I'm able to leave it out to catch wildlife photos with no concern about it getting splashed. Once the photos are posted on Facebook, I always get positive comments on the photos and the quality. LOVE the camera!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Salyers

customer_reviews.title: Odd Safety Warning for a "waterproof" camera
customer_reviews.text: Although the camera is sold as waterproof, the "Important Safety Insructions" that are packed with it offer this interesting quote: "Do not use this video product near water - for example near a bath tub, wash bowl, kitchen sink, or laundry tub, in a wet basement, or near a swimming pool, and the like." At least they don't tell me not to take it out on the lake in my kayak.
customer_reviews.author: B. Staehle

customer_reviews.title: Purchased as gift
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for brother-in-law who loves to go kayaking. He needed something somewhat small and definitely something waterproof. As soon as he opened it he went ON AND ON about just how cool it looks! He loved the color (green) and the size of the screen, the easy set-up, etc. He has mentioned that it takes awesome pictures and it's one of the best gifts he's received. He can't wait to use it in the water!!
customer_reviews.author: L. Purcell

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera, sharp picture, easy to use and light. Only problem doesn't have a view finder and in sunlight it's just point and shoot and hope it comes out ok.
customer_reviews.author: MichRam

customer_reviews.title: Not to shabby
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera when my son was born because I didn't want to have to worry about water damage for bath time pictures. It's a nice little camera. We take it in the pool with us and haven't had any issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: OrangeTeflon

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded our expectations -- great underwater and on land.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this camera for a trip to Maui anticipating that we would do a lot of snorkeling. We were very pleased with the pictures it took. It's a bit tricky taking photos underwater but we got some sharp and clear images of coral, fish, and even turtles. What surprised us was how good the camera was out of water. It has "Sunset" and "Flower" (macro) modes that yieled very nice images. When we next go on a similar trip we will take this camera and also buy the latest version of it.
customer_reviews.author: Coral Reefer

customer_reviews.title: What a picture perfect ,wet and wild cam and video device.
customer_reviews.text: This item given as a gift made my wife and I Superstars in our sons eyes.He loves it.I am in qualty control all my working life and you can not beat this device for the $ spent and the insane quality of the product and its resulting pics and vids.Thank you FUGI. Jeff and Jill Dobrowolski
customer_reviews.author: JEFFREY

customer_reviews.title: pretty awesome
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend is going to the boundary waters soon and he wanted to use my camera but its not waterproof so we bought this. We love the size, color, capabilities, picture quality. It is a rather neat camera and pretty sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: pachuu41

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Fujifilm has created an excellent waterproof camera here. Its affordable and very durable. Ive used mine as a paddle while tubeing the rivers in the Texas heat, and its with held against the tough tides in the tropical Pacific surf.
customer_reviews.author: Akneebreeated

customer_reviews.title: Simply Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This camera is amazing and you CAN'T beat this price! 10 MP and waterproof. My husband and I have had so much fun taking this camera to the pool, kayaking, and fishing, and everyone thinks it is the greatest thing ever. 3 of our friends are buying this camera now too, and I would recommend it to EVERYONE!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: awesome little guy
customer_reviews.text: One battery lasted my entire visit to England, I took 3 minute long videos and over 400 photos and looked through the photos with friends many times. It was amazing. I haven't tried it out in water yet but love it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Tifany Leigh-Logan

customer_reviews.title: Fuji FinePix Z33WP
customer_reviews.text: Camera broke within 6 months... Very sensitive to shock and vibration.. Not too bad if you keep it in bubble wrap ALL THE TIME!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mark@Frontier

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap plastic cover.
customer_reviews.text: I believe the intentions were good for this camera. It does do well in its own realm, which is the outdoors with lots of light. The video does really well also. Indoors with little light creates terrible pictures. Only use this for outdoors. I gave it two stars because the lid for the battery compartment is plastic (unlike the rest of the camera) and it broke on me in my pocket rendering it useless in the water. Could they have spent a few more dollars to make it all metal and a lot more durable? I think so...
customer_reviews.author: B. Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Great Waterproof Camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little "waterproff" camera. I got it to take fishing and on the water instead of my more expensive cameras. The quality of pictures, ease of use, and light weight are excellent. I have not worked up to submierging it but I wanted something that would survive a dunking not take pictures of the Titanic.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Water Damage
customer_reviews.text: This camera worked marginally around the streams and rivers i fished in, I know, its not a $1000 camera. One trip into the ocean and it was water logged and completely destroyed. Still have not figured out how but seeing as it was a WATERPROOF CAMERA I sure would have expected a bit more.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: EXCELENTE CAMARA
customer_reviews.text: TIENE BUENA RESOLUSION. ES DE PERTENENCIA DE BETHEMIT Y EL ME COMENTO QUE LA IMAGEN ES EXCELENTE. DEBAJO DEL AGUA AHY ES QUE ELLA ES FUERTE, MEJOR QUE MUCHAS DE LAS MARCAS DE RENOMBRE EN EL MERCADO. RECOMIENDO ESTA WATERPROOF.
customer_reviews.author: David Bisono

customer_reviews.title: I really like it
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking to take amazing quality pictures, this is not the camera. But if you are looking for saved everyday moments, road trip memories, and some water pics this is the best. Cheap, easy to used and really versatile. You get a nice deal for your money.
customer_reviews.author: Juan F. Adamson

customer_reviews.title: decent quality for the price, but don't expect too much
customer_reviews.text: bought this camera a couple of weeks ago, took it to Hanauma Bay in Hawaii and took some out of the water and underwater pictures. Not the best quality, but they were decent for the price. Out of the water picture quality was pretty good, but the cannon's definitely takes better quality photos. use it for a quick zap, don't expect too much.
customer_reviews.author: I. Wu

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: The camera is very easy to use, small easy to carry, and the pictures are great. I spend a lot of time on the river and wanted a camera that could get wet. I don't think you could find a better waterproof camera for the money. I recommend the accessory kit that goes with it.
customer_reviews.author: G. Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Love my new little camera!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this camera a few days before we went on vacation. I think the pictures are great for an inexpensive light weight camera. I was worried about it being waterproof, but after 10 days of snorkeling and sailing, no problems so far. I would buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: JJShaw

customer_reviews.title: Green Waterproof Digital Camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for my trip to Hawaii. It worked as well as I expected. It was a difficult see the screen underwater to see what I was about to take a picture of and then to know if it was focused. If your are swimming for a while with it, you may want a strap to keep it around your neck or shoulder. The wrist strap is not the easiest to swim with.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Baxter

customer_reviews.title: Gift for my 23 year old son
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted a camera that he could take duck and deer hunting. It had to be durable, take good pictures, take a quick shot, and handle the elements. I got him the Fujifilm for his birthday and he has thanked me 3 times in the last couple of weeks - he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: camera
customer_reviews.text: It is pretty handy little camera and takes pretty decent pictures overall. It just really stinks that you have to take the battery out to charge it. The flash works great but sometimes is a little over powering and it's hard to find the right setting where you can see with out it being to dark or to washed out. but overall a really good little camera.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca M. Tapia

customer_reviews.title: Great underwater
customer_reviews.text: Works great under water and in sunny light but bad quality at night or indoors
customer_reviews.author: Monica H.

customer_reviews.title: first waterproof camera
customer_reviews.text: I just received my camera. It's a lot smaller then what i was expecting. So far I really like it took a few pictures around the house and so far so good. Taking the pictures looking at the display they look a little grainy but the pictures weren't. I filled up the sink and tried it worked great! Great camera for the money.
customer_reviews.author: M. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Value for price
customer_reviews.text: What more should you ask of a 100$ camera. Excellent design - waterproof - decent pictures - video ability. If you want to make this primary camera then go for high end camera. But, buy this one as a secondary camera to your Nikkon's to use in wet places.
customer_reviews.author: Naveen Kumar Nair

customer_reviews.title: Bad refurbished
customer_reviews.text: The camera has good quality pictures, but the flash doesn't shoot and the battery charger never charges the battery, was over.
customer_reviews.author: Julio EBC

customer_reviews.title: Great for underwater, decent for dry
customer_reviews.text: Takes AMAZING underwater pictures!! Definitely worth it!! Not the best zoom though. For most settings it's fantastic. Good video too.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian Barker

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera because I wanted something for the outdoors, so far I already took this camera to two water parks and take great pictures and video too. No complaints at all, I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Deleon

customer_reviews.title: great for my 12 y.o.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for my son to take to boyscout camp-- He loves it!!! He really likes the focusing & quality of the pictures. PLUS-- I could not find it for 3 weeks-- finally my son told me it was in the fishing boat. OH no!! I found it submerged under rainwater I took it out,dried it off-- and it turned on!!! It works great!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Ray

customer_reviews.title: Good camera with not so great controls.
customer_reviews.text: It works like it should but the controls are clunky. Bought for vacation to Hawaii, takes better pictures than I expected, now it's the camera I give my kids to use because it's tough.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Medisch

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Camera
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought this camera for me at Christmas, and I love it. It takes great pictures and video, I haven't used it underwater yet but plan on it this summer. We have also booked a cruise later this yr to Mexico and I plan on using it while snorkeling. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Jill Davis

customer_reviews.title: Fuji Z33WP 'Underwater' Camera
customer_reviews.text: The Z33WP is billed as an underwater camera. Don't believe it. Had trouble during first try at 2-foot depth; but thought that perhaps I improperly closed the door. Dried camera out and seemed to be okay after testing in a sink. Second try underwater (snorkel depth) deep-sixed the camera. It no longer works.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Chicago

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice
customer_reviews.text: This little camera is awesome. It is compact and works great in all environments. It works very well underwater. Pictures are crystal clear!
customer_reviews.author: Beth B Mcneal

customer_reviews.title: CHECK REVIEWS B4 BUYING
customer_reviews.text: Just after a year that I bought this camera (I only use it a few times in the summer), it started to make some strange noises everytime that it's turned on. I hope that this is not an indication that it's going to die in any moment. I bought it for the waterproof feature which is ok, but this camera is not good for indoor pictures.
customer_reviews.author: M.W

customer_reviews.title: It's fine
customer_reviews.text: It's fine for the purpose intended. If I were looking for a really good camera, I would pick something else. The construction is "cheaper" than what I expected. But I do like that you can take two simultaneous pics - one with the flash and one without, so that you can pick the best one. That is a great feature!
customer_reviews.author: T. Champion

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great!
customer_reviews.text: It does what it suppose to do, but Picture quality of Canon or Lumix is better.
customer_reviews.author: A shopper

product_meta.title: Fujifilm FinePix Z33WP 10MP Waterproof Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom (Pink)
product_meta.description:
Color:PinkFROM THE MANUFACTURER
The FinePix Z33WP is Fujifilm’s first waterproof digital camera. No longer do you need to worry about damaging your camera in less than optimum shooting conditions. The FinePix Z33WP ensures you’ll never miss capturing any of life’s precious moments, any where, any time, under any conditions, and be able to share them easily with your extended network of friends and family members. The 10-megapixel FinePix Z33WP is ready for any adventure including underwater activity up to 10 feet. The Z33WP uses a Fujinon 3x optical zoom lens, has Fujifilm’s ‘Automatic Scene Recognition’ SR AUTO mode, and features a 2.7-inch, 230,000 pixel resolution LCD screen. 



Intelligent Scene Recognition
Adding ease to outdoor navigation, the FinePix Z33WP is equipped with a new SR Auto (Automatic Scene Recognition) mode that enables the camera to intelligently recognize six types of scenes automatically. For each picture taken in this mode, the Z33WP will optimize the ideal exposure, focus, white balance and ISO for the scene to ensure the best quality picture is captured with ease. In addition, Fujifilm’s Picture Stabilization is powered by high sensitivity for faster shutter and operational speeds to help reduce camera shake, keeping real life moments as true to form as possible. 

Easy Sharing
The family-friendly Z33WP also features Fujifilm’s handy Blog Mode which allows for easier sharing with friends and family members. The Blog mode automatically resizes a photo to a standard 640x480 pixels (VGA) or 320x240 pixels (QVGA) image size and enables 12 in-camera editing features such as Zooming, Miniature effect, Illustration and Painting, cutting the need for extra time with home editing. 

In addition to these innovations, the FinePix Z33WP is loaded with the following handy features:  *  Face Detection in action
 * Face Detection Technology: Operating in tandem with automatic red-eye removal, the FinePix Z33WP identifies up to 10 human faces in a scene, and sets the correct focus and exposure, regardless of where subjects are located within the frame. 
 * Automatic Red Eye Removal accents the aforementioned features by lending an extra touch to that group shot. The Z33WP automatically checks for red eye and self-corrects it in each and every person in the photo, saving time on post-editing. 
 * Couple and Group Timer Modes: Working in conjunction with Face Detection technology, detects two faces in 'Couple Timer Mode' and up to four faces in 'Group Timer Mode' in a frame. 
 * One Touch MOVIE Button: Capture VGA quality movie clips at 30 frames per second with sound to capture all of those once-in-a-lifetime moments. 
 * Battery Life: The long-life rechargeable Li-ion battery (up to 200 shots) allows for extended use without worrying if the camera is going to last for the duration of the trip.
feature_bullets: 10.0-megapixel resolution for large, photo quality prints
3x optical zoom; 2.7-inch LCD screen with Micro Thumbnail View
50 MB built-in memory; capture images to SD/SDHC memory cards (not included)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars307 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
